title: Wiltshire Premier Shield
text:
The Wiltshire Premier Shield is a single county cup competition involving <a href="England">English</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> clubs based in the county of <a href="Wiltshire">Wiltshire</a>.
The current competition format operates with a two-leg semi-final and a single match final during the latter stages of the league season.
The most successful team in the competition's history is <a href="Swindon%20Town%20F.C.">Swindon Town</a> who have won the shield 27 times. Swindon Town are the only Wiltshire representative in the <a href="Football%20League">Football League</a> and have often used the Wiltshire Shield to field their youths, reserves and players who are returning from injury.
The competition consists of four teams. These are <a href="Swindon%20Town%20F.C.">Swindon Town</a>, <a href="Salisbury%20City%20F.C.">Salisbury City</a>, <a href="Chippenham%20Town%20F.C.">Chippenham Town</a> and <a href="Swindon%20Supermarine%20F.C.">Swindon Supermarine</a>.
